page.title: 01TROON MARINA
page.content: There are many sailing boats tied up at the pontoons in Troon Marina. Some people leave their boats there all the year round. Other people who come to Troon for a holiday stay in their boats for a week or two then sail off somewhere else.During the month of June 500 boats are berthed in the inner basin.Round the World Yachtsman ,Robin Knox Johnston , was the inspiration behind the idea. Attached to the Marina is a most attractive Chandlery selling a large variety of nautical goods.Another pleasing feature of Troon Marina is a magnificent eating place named Scoffs. In the month of July an open day is held so that the people of Troon can enjoy the facilities. 2 2
